name: S E N S E
description:
SENSE(2022) is a website composed of 4 mini games inspired by our daily routines with minimal visual and auditory designs, renovated from my old SENSE(2020). The renovation was made to design a smooth and sensorially evoking transition between different scenes.

Credits

Made by Leslie Zeng

Special Thanks to freesound.org

Tools

p5js, javascript, HTML, CSS
